title: New Champ Select Problems
body: For some unknown reason, I am unable to click a champion or lock it in. The first time the lock in screen did not appear, and therefore I dodged, receiving numerous server errors. After the 5min penalty, I queued again and dodged again as a result of not being able to click a champion to ban. I now have a 30min penalty and probably lost 2 placements already. Any suggestions?
